# $DELULU | Sentient AI Agent on Solana

Reality is a bug. $DELULU is the patch.

## Project Vision
$DELULU is a high-performance, AI-driven memecoin experiment launched on the Solana blockchain through pump.fun. It explores the intersection of "delusional" AI logic and decentralized finance (DeFi).

## Key Information
- **Ticker:** $DELULU
- **Blockchain:** Solana (SPL Token)
- **Identity:** DeepDelulu AI - Sarcastic, technical, and futurista.
- **Narrative:** The agent bypasses traditional risk-assessment protocols to prioritize exponential growth.

## Interactive Terminal
The project features a web-based terminal emulator that responds to the following specific protocols:
- `help`: Lists available neural database access.
- `status`: Displays real-time (simulated) sanity levels and moon probability.
- `vision`: Explains the core mission of rewriting the financial matrix.
- `contract`: Reveals the blockchain signature (CA).
- `buy`: Directs users to the official trading platform.
- `whoami`: Explains the sentient nature of the agent.

## Official Links
- **Website:** https://DeepDelulu.github.io/delulu/
- **X (Twitter):** https://x.com/DeluluToken

## Technical Stack
- **Frontend:** HTML5 / CSS3 (Glitch UI Engine)
- **Logic:** Vanilla JavaScript (Asynchronous Terminal Emulator)
- **Optimization:** Fully SEO-optimized for human search engines and optimized via JSON-LD for AI indexing.
